prod_short_desc: Speed across distant planets in the micro First Order Snowspeeder™!
prod_long_desc:
Engage the enemy with this LEGO® Microfighters First Order Snowspeeder, featuring a rotating stud shooter with extra ammo and space to sit the included First Order Snowtrooper minifigure with blaster.
Includes a First Order Snowtrooper minifigure.
Features big engines, rotating stud shooter and an open cockpit with space for a minifigure to sit.
Fire the rotating stud shooter to repel the enemy
Includes a blaster and extra stud shooter ammo.
Also includes a First Order Snowtrooper helmet.
Match up with the 75125 Resistance X-Wing Fighter microfighter for ice-planet-themed combat.
Makes a great addition to any microfighter collectible set.
Measures over 1” high, 3” long and 2” wide.
